Text: To be used only by SnApp developers.
**Please note that this parameter's documentation is visible only by users with VGS-Support right**, as it should be internal use only.
It prevents SnApp services from being started at system startup.\
Services can still be manually started.
Useful when having different tomcats dedicated to different services (like one for BKO only and one for B2B only).
The value is a comma-separated list of context.\
- **WPG**: Web Payment Gateway (online credit card payment callbacks)
Overrides default HealthCheck cache duration in MS (default is 1000ms).
In order to prevent abuses of the endpoint **/health-check** that could take down the system, the health status of the system if not checked on each call.
Overrides default URL used by SnApp to talk to VGS store.
VGS store needs to be contacted by SnApp to download software updates and license information.
